body.name: USX MOUNT TV Wall Bracket Tilting Universal TV Mount for Most 26-55 Inch Flat Screen TV with Weight Capacity Up to 99lbs, Low Profile +/-12 ° Tilt TV Bracket with Tilting Knob,Max VESA 400x400mm
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 16 hrs 40 mins
features: UNIVERSAL TV WALL MOUNT COMPATIBILITY: Tilting wall mount bracket fits for most of 26-55 inches(including 55,50,49,48,46,43,42,40,37,35,34,32,30,28,26 inchTVs /flat-screen) , VESA size available from 50x50mm to 400x400mm, Max weight capacity 99lbs. Studs Spacing: 8''~16''.

TOOL FREE ADJUSTABLE TV MOUNT & REDUCE-GLARING: Our tilting tv mount with tilting knob, easily tilt +/-12 degree to anti-glaring and improve the comfortable viewing experience. Besides, you can slide the two TV brackets left and right to get your TV centered easily.

LOW PROFILE & SAVING SPACE: The wall mount TV bracket 2 inches away from the wall, saving space and prevent children or pets from hitting the TV, the lanyard with magnet, can be hidden and looking more modern stylish.

EASY FOR INSTALLATION: TV wall mount installation can be finished within 10 Minutes, all mounting hardware included hardware in pre-labeled bags and detailed step-by-step installation instruction to assist your installation. Pulling straps can help you easily lock and release your TV. (Concrete anchors will be sent per request.), NOTE: DO NOT install into drywall alone.

US BASED CUSTOMER SUPPORT: USX mount has more than 20 years of experience in the area of tv wall bracket. We are glad to answers your pre-purchase and installation questions. Our TV mount is 10-year after-sales service!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong and Easy to Install
reviews.reviewText: Mount is adjustable from left to right. This made installation into studs much easier. Highly recommend locating studs and aligning the provided template to pre-drill bolt holes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for 85”
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to hang new 85” tv in conference room. Solid quality, easy to assemble, no issues at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Misleading ad, but works pretty well
reviews.reviewText: First, I like the bracket and the kit, well made, works nicely, but it has minor issues, read on. I mounted on this bracket a 55" TV with 400x400 mounting pattern. Ok, if you mount the bracket flush to the back of a TV this size, and the bracket flush against the wall, then you will not be able to tilt to the maximum allowable by the bracket, because the bottom of the TV will hit the wall first. If you want full tilt with a TV this size, you need to either space the bracket from the wall, or space the TV from the bracket. The kit has a variety of spacers so you may be able to make it work. I chose to space the bracket from the wall using a 1x4 pine board, but I also had to do this because of stud spacing. So this bracket is smaller than some of the pics let on. If you use the 400x400 mounting pattern, then you have maybe one inch of side to side adjustment remaining on the wall bracket because the wall bracket is only slightly wider than 16 inches. This means that, if you want to span a pair of studs, you are stuck mounting the TV where the studs are, which may not match where you actually want the TV. The only solution is to mount a board on the wall, directly to the studs, that is wider than the stud spacing, so you can then mount the bracket in your desired location. Of course you could attempt to mount the bracket directly to drywall, but I was not willing to risk my TV with that. Again, using this pine board also spaced the TV far enough from the wall that I could achieve full tilt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for 65" OLED TV
reviews.reviewText: Used this on a wall with 16" studs. It's ability to slide left or right allowed me to position the TV exactly where I wanted it. Plenty of room in the bracket for a double low voltage box on one side and an electric outlet on the other. Note that my electric outlet is NOT recessed, and I have a wall wart plug that keeps the TV from sitting fully back to the wall, but for my use, this is not an issue. Without that wall plug, the TV would be a little closer to the wall.The included cardboard template was also helpful in planning where to position the mount so that my TV would be at the correct height.The ability to pull the TV away from the wall and easily rotate it to the side allows viewing from an area to the side of my main viewing area.I have no concerns of the TV falling, as the mount is very stable when moving.I would purchase again in a heartbeat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We bought and installed this unit for an 81” TV a few years ago. That TV died, so we just put a 75” one in its place. This mounting rack is so versatile- it works for 16” and 24” center studs, the TV can be adjusted to the side, if the studs are not centered, and it’s heavy-duty enough to practically swing from it. It comes with a great selection of hardware and it’s own mini-level, which we needed with the new TV. And it has a 10 year warranty!! It pulls out, tilts up, down, and to the side. We totally love it, and highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We needed a basic wallmount for a 32” tv and this one fit all our needs. Easy to connect and set up; and a great value.
